---
title: "Beer matching balance"
output: html_notebook
---

```
library(plyr)

prop <- 'styles'
#prop <- 'countries'
classes <- c('M', 'L')

data <- read.csv(sprintf('~/Desktop/%s_5.csv', prop), header=TRUE)
total <- data[1,]
data <- data[-1,]

lh <- data[c(prop, sprintf('%s.%s', classes[1], classes[2]),
  sprintf('%s.%s', classes[2], classes[1]))]
colnames(lh) <- c(prop, 'BA', 'RB')

lh$ratio_BA <- lh$BA / (lh$BA + lh$RB)
lh$ratio_RB <- lh$RB / (lh$BA + lh$RB)

head(lh[order(lh$BA + lh$RB, decreasing=TRUE),], 10)
```
